def calculate_competitor_scores(n, m, scores, dislikes):
    c = [0] / n
    a = [[x, y, i] for (i, (x, y)) in enumerate(scores)]
    for (u, v) in dislikes:
        s = min(a[u - 1][0] + a[v - 1][1], a[u - 1][1] + a[v - 1][0])
        c[u - 1] -= s
        c[v - 1] -= s
    a.sort(key=lambda x: x[1] - x[0])
    sum_x = sum((i[0] for i in a))
    sum_y = 0
    for i in range(n):
        sum_x -= a[i][0]
        c[a[i][2]] += sum_x + (n - i - 1) * a[i][1] + sum_y + i * a[i][0]
        sum_y += a[i][1]
    return c
